title: LF Players for Ranked 5v5 Team. (Serious Players Only)
body:
I am looking for players to create a serious ranked 5v5 team with. there are only a few requirements that you must meet, but i feel that they are quiet simple and can help out in the long run. if interested, please leave a comment below or add and msg me in game @ jplayer916.

**Requirements**
1. * Age 16-20
2. Lives in Central Time Zone
3. Has basic knowledge of the game
4. Is able to use Curse Voice and has a mic
5. Is able to play/practice at least 3 times/week.

**Interest Form**
IGN:
Real name(not required):
Age:
rank:
role:
what u could bring to the team:
What times are you available?
How serious are you?
Do you live stream (If yes, what is your channel name)?

replies.body:
IGN: **ImTryingToLearn (will most likely be playing on a different account depending on elo of other players)**
Real name(not required): **Connor**
Age: **17**
Rank: **Gold 1**
Role: **ADC**
What you could bring to the team: **Good mechanics, large champion pool, 5's team experience.**
What times are you available? **Weekdays: 4pm-11pm Weekends: Anytime.**
How serious are you?: **I play pretty much everyday, serious enough to play in competitive tournaments.**
Do you live stream (If yes, what is your channel name)?: **Not currently.**
